name: Digital Runner
description: It's simple "bunny hop" runner. Does not matters how skilled you are, you will lose anyway, but dont worry, that's not your fault. The system is broken.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / Windows 8 / Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 460 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 47 MB available space
